definition: outstanding/particularly, especially/a fault/to express discontentment against

sentences.english: A lot of jellyfish are lookers.

sentences.chinese: 她真是一個美麗的尤物。

sentences.english: Now, let's catch a glimpse of these hot and fabulous women.
sentences.chinese: 下面我們就來一睹這些性感尤物的風采吧。

sentences.english: Are clothing manufacturers helping to turn young girls into sex objects?
sentences.chinese: 難道服裝製造商正在幫助年輕女孩轉型爲性感尤物？

sentences.english: His first big move was a stunner .
sentences.chinese: 他的第一個大動作是一個尤物。

sentences.english: I am the original sexy beast.
sentences.chinese: 我可是原汁原味的性感尤物。

definition: beauty unmatched in her generation (idiom); woman of peerless elegance/prettiest girl ever
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful/also written 傾城傾國|倾城倾国[qing1 cheng2 qing1 guo2]
lit. capable of causing the downfall of a city or state (idiom)/fig. (of a woman) devastatingly beautiful
a feast for the eyes (idiom)/(of women) gorgeous/graceful/(of scenery) beautiful
magnificent style unmatched in his generation (idiom); peerless talent
(of a woman) to have nice curves/buxom/shapely
divine fragrance, national grace (idiom); an outstanding beauty
